quote: I hated longing. I hated it almost as much as I hated pining. It sapped the mind of good judgment, filled the heart with achiness, and distracted the vagina from other potential conquests.
quote_letters: I HATED LONGING I HATED IT ALMOST AS MUCH AS I HATED PINING IT SAPPED THE MIND OF GOOD JUDGMENT FILLED THE HEART WITH ACHINESS AND DISTRACTED THE VAGINA FROM OTHER POTENTIAL CONQUESTS
